# UIImage.SymbolScale.unspecified

**Case**

An unspecified scale.

## Declaration

```swift
case unspecified
```

## Discussion

When you specify this value, the image inherits the scale value from its current environment.

## Symbol image scales

- **UIImage.SymbolScale.default**: The default scale variant that matches the system usage.
- **UIImage.SymbolScale.small**: The small variant of the symbol image.
- **UIImage.SymbolScale.medium**: The medium variant of the symbol image
- **UIImage.SymbolScale.large**: The large variant of the symbol image.
